Excluded cards:
- ATI Rage (all), Radeon VE and Radeon 7000, 7500, 9000
- ATI Mobility Radeon (original, laptop)
- NVidia GeForce 4 MX 420 or 440 PCI
- Nvidia Quadro NVS
- Nvidia GeForce 2 series
- Nvidia Geforce4 440 Go 64M (laptop users)
- Kyro 3D Prophet
- Matrox
- 3D Labs
- Intel Onboard (all versions)

  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 220 / ATI Radeon HD 3870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7 (latest SP) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.8 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
